alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coast; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 08 at 9:53PM PST until February 09 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO NOON PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Coast, Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County Coastal Valleys and Santa Clarita Valley. * WHEN...From 4 AM to noon PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coast; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys
